alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Tammany and southeastern Tangipahoa Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Robert, or 8 miles southeast of Hammond. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Madisonville and Robert. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 41 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
